basics.name: Agustin Gil
basics.label: Knowledge in web and backend development: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5, React, Java, C#, .NET, and SQL Server. Self-taught and eager to apply skills in real-world projects.
basics.summary: I'm currently studying Programmer Analyst at ORT University, with training in web and backend development. I have knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5, React, Java, C#, .NET, and SQL Server. I'm passionate about technology, continuous learning, and building functional, well-designed solutions.

projects.name: Projects made in ORT University
projects.description: This project is a management system I developed as a full-stack developer, designed with a focus on clean, logical solutions that align with program requirements. While not fully completed—since certain non-essential features were intentionally left out—it demonstrates my ability to deliver maintainable and scalable code. The system is built primarily in C#, applying solid architectural principles to ensure clarity and robustness. I also designed and implemented a custom MySQL database to handle and structure the project’s data, showcasing my skills in both backend development and database design.

projects.name: WeateherNow - Weather WebApp
projects.description: Gym App is an application designed for small gyms with the purpose of providing a platform where users' routines can be displayed on screen. These routines will dynamically change depending on the time the user visits the gym.
